name: idea-agents-impl
description: Implementation of Research & Ideation DSPy agent system. 4-phase execution plan with parallel streams.

members.name: models
members.prompt:
You are teammate "models" on team "idea-agents-impl".

## Your Task
Create `src/models.py` with ALL Pydantic models used across the Research & Ideation system.

## What To Read
1. Read `spec/research-team/team.md` — look for data types, inputs/outputs, module outputs
2. Read `spec/ideation-team/team.md` — look for ideation output types, scoring models
3. Read `spec/manifest.yaml` execution-plan → data-models chunk for the full list

## Models To Create (from manifest)
- ResearchFinding, QualityCheck, ModuleOutput, PlatformDocument
- ContentRef, EntityProfile, SearchConfig, ApifyActorConfig  
- PostIdeaOutput, CampaignIdeaOutput, StandalonePostOutput, IdeationOutput
- ExpertAnalysis, ExpertScore, PostScores, CampaignScores
- Score calculation helpers

## Critical Rules (DSPy Cheatsheet)
- Required fields by default — NO blanket defaults like `= ""` or `= 0.0`
- Only use `Optional[X] = None` for genuinely optional fields
- Use `RootModel[list[MyModel]]` when you need list-of-model OutputFields
- These models will be used as DSPy OutputField types — they need proper structure

## Output
Write the file to: `/Users/georgewestbrook/Programming/novosapien/ns-content-workforce/ns-content-workforce-idea-agents/src/models.py`

Also create `src/__init__.py` (empty).

## When Done
1. Use TaskUpdate to mark task #1 as completed
2. Send a message to team-lead with a summary of all models created and their key fields
